title: Diagnostic Markers
description: Clinically relevant biomarkers. Most of the assays such as IHC are covered by the NCIT under the sub-hierarchy NCIT:C25294 (Laboratory Procedure). For example, NCIT:C68748 (HER2/Neu Positive), NCIT:C131711 (Human Papillomavirus-18 Positive)

id.description: A CURIE-style identifier of clinically relevant biomarkers (e.g., NCIT:C68748).

OntologyClass.title: Diagnostic Marker Ontology
OntologyClass.description: A class (aka term, concept) in an ontology. FHIR mapping: CodeableConcept (http://www.hl7.org/fhir/datatypes.html#CodeableConcept). See also Coding (http://www.hl7.org/fhir/datatypes.html#Coding).
